scene_description: Astronaut discovering ancient alien artifact on Mars at sunset

structured_prompt.short_description: An astronaut stands in awe, discovering an ancient alien artifact at sunset on Mars

objects.description: Astronaut in a sleek, futuristic spacesuit with a visible face through the helmet's visor, conveying a mix of awe, curiosity, and introspection
objects.shape_and_color: Silver and black spacesuit with golden accents, contrasting with the ancient, mysterious alien artifact
objects.texture: Shiny metallic spacesuit and intricate, unknown textures of the artifact
objects.appearance_details: Astronaut's face shows a deep, introspective contemplation, with the artifact's details and textures evident
objects.pose: Static, with a subtle reach towards the artifact, symbolizing the moment of discovery
objects.orientation: Facing the camera, with the artifact to their left

objects.description: Ancient alien artifact with unfamiliar shapes and textures, representing the unknown
objects.shape_and_color: Mysterious, earthy tones with hints of an otherworldly blue
objects.texture: Intricate, alien textures that invite curiosity
objects.appearance_details: Artifact's details and textures are evident, with long shadows cast by the setting sun
objects.pose: Static, as a counterpart to the astronaut's pose
objects.orientation: Facing the astronaut, with the setting sun behind

structured_prompt.background_setting: Barren, dusty Martian landscape at sunset, with a vast, crimson and gold sky

lighting.conditions: Cinematic, warm, and contemplative, with a hint of the unknown
lighting.direction: 3/4 backlight, casting long shadows across the astronaut and the artifact
lighting.shadow: Deep, defined shadows that emphasize the textures and details of the artifact

aesthetics.composition: Rule of thirds, with the astronaut and the artifact placed along these lines to create a visually appealing and balanced frame
aesthetics.color_scheme: Teal and orange, with the warm, golden light of the setting sun contrasting with the cool, blue-ish hues of the Martian landscape
aesthetics.mood_atmosphere: Profound reverence and contemplation, with a sense of wonder and awe

photographic_characteristics.depth_of_field: f/5.6, to ensure both the astronaut and the artifact are in focus, while the distant Martian landscape fades into a soft blur
photographic_characteristics.focus: Sharp on the astronaut and the artifact
photographic_characteristics.camera_angle: Slightly off-center, with the astronaut to the right and the artifact to their left

simple_prompt: An astronaut stands in awe, discovering an ancient alien artifact at sunset on Mars. Camera: Slightly off-center, with the astronaut to the right and the artifact to their left. Lens: 50mm. Lighting: Cinematic, warm, and contemplative, with a hint of the unknown
